#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

char X[105];

int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int n, s = 0;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    getchar();
    while(t--)
    {
        s = 0;
        cin>>X;
        int l = strlen(X);

        for(int i=0; i<l; i++)
        {
            if(X[i] >= '0' && X[i] <= '9')
            {
                n = 0;
                while(X[i] >= '0' && X[i] <= '9')
                {
                    n = n*10;
                    n = n + X[i]-'0';
                    i++;
                }
                s = s + n;
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n", s);
    }

    return 0;
}
